 2015-04812015-04-30NRCAN,  NEB,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectAmending Order AO-005-GC-113 - Nova Gas Transmission Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE by the National Energy Board of Amending Order AO-005-GC-113 to NOVA GAS TRANSMISSION LTD in order to reflect the removal of the Hackett Lateral and Hackett Lateral Loop, and the Hackett Meter Station sold to Ember Resources Inc.
AttachmentsAttachment
